publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6018 Linda Fabiani: Tribute to Billy Wolfe, Scotland Livesâ€”That the Parliament expresses its sadness at the death of Billy Wolfe, former leader of the SNP and lifelong peace campaigner; considers that he transformed the SNP into a modern and vibrant political party and was pivotal in making it a force in Scottish politics; applauds his dedication to conservation including his work on Eilean Mor MacCormick and his formidable opposition to the presence of nuclear weapons in Scotland; further applauds the universality, love and friendship that he espoused, and offers its sympathy and condolences to his family and many friends.
